Arcane Focus.Name: Crystal
Arcane Focus.Description: A crystal used as a focus for casting spells.

Arcane Focus.Name: Orb
Arcane Focus.Description: A mystical orb used by spellcasters as a focus for their magical powers.

Arcane Focus.Name: Rod
Arcane Focus.Description: A magical rod often adorned with runes, used as a focus for spellcasting.

Arcane Focus.Name: Staff
Arcane Focus.Description: A wooden staff often carved with arcane symbols, used as a focus for spellcasting.

Arcane Focus.Name: Wand
Arcane Focus.Description: A slender wand used by wizards and other spellcasters as a focus for their spells.

Arcane Focus.Name: Holy Symbol
Arcane Focus.Description: A religious symbol representing a deity or higher power, used as a focus by clerics and paladins for divine magic.

Arcane Focus.Name: Druidic Focus
Arcane Focus.Description: An item imbued with nature's power, such as a sprig of mistletoe or a totem, used as a focus by druids for their spells.
